title: André Leon Talley on 'The Chiffon Trenches'
description: Talley talks about his new memoir; Claudia Rankine and Jericho Brown read new poems; and Megha Majumdar discusses her debut novel, "A Burning."
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
